intro: ^Mrcalindas?Smiling "My mother should be done with her first water fitness class with Mrs. Lee any minute now."

s: ^Oh, I'm so excited for her. Mrs. Lee will help her get settled.

Chat1: ^Mrcalindas?Smiling "I'm feeling pretty good about things, honestly."
^Mrcalindas?Smiling "It's really feeling like Bloomwood is a great place for my whole family. Did you have ideas for Brooklyn?

s: ^Well, I think you're going to be happy. Brooklyn too!
^I'm excited to share what I learned!

Chat2: ^Mrcalindas?Neutral "Really? Paz and I were on the phone with Jessica last night, trying to make a plan for Brooklyn's time here. I'm looking forward to settling some of her anxiety."

s: ^The Library and the Community Center have activities. They taught me a lot!

ReadyToSolve: ^Mrcalindas?Neutral "Oh? Rashad and Lila are both very thoughtful. I would like to know what they think."

s: ^Actually, before I commit, let me check my journal again.

Option1: ^Mrcalindas?Smiling "This makes a lot of sense. An over-tired child is never going to get as much out of an activity as a well-rested child. And a hungry person is often a cranky person."
^Mrcalindas?Smiling "It seems like the things you take into account for autistic children are similar to the things you keep in mind with other children, if you’re savvy to their ways."

s: ^Maybe, but with a little planning for an exit strategy if things go wrong.

Option2: ^Mrcalindas?Neutral "Hmm. Did you come up with anything more specific?"
^Let me see what else I can find, Mr. Calindas.
Option3: ^Mrcalindas?Neutral "I feel like this is part of the picture, but did you learn anything else?"
^Let me see what else I can find, Mr. Calindas.
Option4: ^Mrcalindas?Smiling "I am comforted to know that there are places in Bloomwood that are prepared to support Brooklyn."
^Mrcalindas?Smiling "Maybe my mother and I can take her to playtime at the Community Center or possibly to story time at the Library."

s: ^I think Brooklyn is going to have an excellent week!

SolvedGoodbye: ^. I appreciate all of your help. I know Jessica and Paz will too."
^I learned a lot today, Mr. Calindas. Thank you!
TempGoodbye: ^Mrcalindas?Neutral "I’ll be here when you come back."
